0000000011100000 - Mov @(R3),R0 -- R0 = 0x00C1
0000000011000001 - Mov @(R2),R1 -- R1 = 0x00E0
0000010000000001 - Add R0,R1   	-- R1 = 0x01A1
0011000000000001 - Bit R0,R1 	-- FLAGS are zeros
0000000000100010 - Mov R1,R2   	-- R2 = 0x01A1
0000100000000010 - sub R0,R2   	-- R2 = 0x00E0
1100000000000001 - NOP
0001010001000001 - OR R2,R1    	-- R1 = 0x01E1
0001100000100010 - XOR R1,R2   	-- R2 = 0x0101
0000010010111011 - Add @R1,X(R3)-- ram(1222) = 0x8002
0000010010111011
0001110001000011 - cmp R2,R3	-- Flags are zeros
0001000011000001 - Bic @R2,R1   -- R1 = 0x1E0
1000000011100001 - Inv R1  	-- R1 = 0xFE1F
1000000100000001 - LSR R1  	-- R1 = 0x7F0F
1000010000011100 - jmp @X(R0)	-- PC = 0xD3
0000000000010000 - X=0x10      
1000001001110010 - Clr(-R2)	-- ram(0x100) = 0 , R2=0x100
1000000101110110 - ASR @-(R2)	-- ram(0x1) = 0x60 , R2=0xFF
1000000101000100 - RORC @(R0)	-- ram(0xC1) = 0x6000
1100000101110011 - BR		-- PC=0x14A
1000000000000010 - Inc(R2)	-- R2=0x100
1000000001100001 - Dec(R1)	-- R1=0x7F0E
0000010001100010 - Add R3,R2	-- R2=0x24D
1000000100101010 - ROR(R2)+	-- ram(0x24D)=0xE000 , R2=0x24E
1000000110000010 - LSL(R2)	-- R2=0x049C
1100001001100011 - BNE		-- PC=0x1B3
0000001111100001 - Mov @X(R3),R1-- R1=0x4A7
0000001011110000 - X=0x02F0      
1100100000000001 - JSR R0,R1	-- PC=0x4A7,R0=0x1B6	ram(0x49B)=0x00C1	R2=0x49B
1000000111000001 - ROLC(R1)	-- R1=0x094E
1100001100001111 - BEQ		      
1101000000000001 - RTS R0,R1 	-- PC=0x1B6	R0=0x00C1	R2=0x49C
1100000000000000 - HLT
